question:
Which of the following matters can be taken up in Lok Adalats?
1. Land Acquisition cases
2. Non compoundable offences
3. Electricity matters
4. Housing Finance cases
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The following matters can be taken up in Lok Adalats: (1) Land Acquisition cases, (2) Electricity matters, (3) Housing Finance cases, (4) Bank
Recovery cases, (5) Pension cases, (6) Housing Board and Slum Clearance cases etc. Non compoundable offences do not fall in the preview of Lok Adalats.
